heading: HR00949
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON SENIOR CITIZENS, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED PRACTICE OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM (GSIS) OF DEDUCTING BY LUMPSUM THE PENSIONS OF RETIREES, AS PAYMENT FOR EXISTING LOANS, TO THE DETRIMENT OF OUR SENIOR CITIZEN-RETIREES, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENACTING LEGISLATION TO REGULATE THE SAME
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-06-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00949
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON SENIOR CITIZENS, TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED PRACTICE OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM (GSIS) OF DEDUCTING BY LUMPSUM THE PENSIONS OF RETIREES, AS PAYMENT FOR EXISTING LOANS, TO THE DETRIMENT OF OUR SENIOR CITIZEN-RETIREES, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENACTING LEGISLATION TO REGULATE THE SAME
